mcdutil.description: Extensions that provide multiple features that are useful for developing Datapack
mcdutil.commands.createFile.title: Create Datapack File
mcdutil.commands.scoreOperation.title: Formula to Score Operation
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.objective: **Formula to Score Operation**: Score Objective name
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.response: **Formula to Score Operation**: This variable is assigned to the right side
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.temp: **Formula to Score Operation**: Variables that are temporarily saved on the way
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.forceInput: **Formula to Score Operation**: How to enter formula
Use InputBox if there is no Selection
mcdutil.config.createDatapackTemplate.cu: The name displayed in the selection field
Whether it is selected by default (default: false)
Relative file path under DatapackName (In case of file, extension is required)
\\ : * ? " < > | cannot be used for file/folder names
File contents (Basically one item is interpreted as one line)
mcdutil.config.createFile.fileTemplate: Contents described when the file is generated (can be set for each file type)
